page.title: 06Health Care: FINTRY
page.content:
While some go to doctors in Killearn and Kippen, most go to the {Balfron {Health Centre.}This operates in a new purpose built building. The practice has three Doctors, a Nurse and two Receptionists. A visiting surgery is offered in Fintry on two afternoons a week. Many people are visited at home, by Doctor or{District Nurse. { {Hospital treatment}can be arranged in either Stirling or Glasgow. Emergencies and patients lacking transport are taken in by ambulance. {A Range Rover Ambulance can be used in {bad weather (winter snow). { {Dental care}is available in Balfron or one of the nearby towns.
Most would agree we are well served & in some ways better than in the towns.
